subject: Football
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Did you hear the one about the punter who prosecuted the punter who knifed the punter? It’s no joke and may be the most warped example of bad sports, the furthest case of all from funny.
snippet: Did you hear the one about the punter who prosecuted the punter who knifed the punter? It’s no joke and may be the most warped example of bad sports, the furthest case of all from funny.
